channel.title: The Sydney Morning Herald National Headlines
channel.description: The top National headlines from The Sydney Morning Herald. For all the news, visit http://www.smh.com.au.

item.title: Abbott gives first aid to scooter rider after bingle
item.description:
Federal Opposition leader Tony Abbott was involved in a minor car accident last night when the car he was travelling in collided with a scooter.

item.title: The passion principle
